name: hurr & the Castle of Trickster
description:
hurr & the Castle of Trickster
Continuing from the events of 'hurr & the Race against Time' game, your mission is to guide hurr through a castle to retrieve 6 children who had recently gone missing.

This is my Metroid-like submission for an Itch.io game jam (June to July Metroidvania Jam) ending next Friday the 10th of August, 2018. It was made using the Construct 2 engine over a period of 5 days, and contains assets sourced from OpenGameArt.org, Sounds-Resource.com and so on.

Controls
Left and Right arrow keys for moving left and right
Up or Z for jumping
X for punching
...
